name: Adventure Tactics
description:
This is a pre-alpha version, with a fully functional gameplay loop and progression system.

  • To perform attacks, three skills are placed inside a 3x3 grid.
  • Adjacent skills sometimes interact (e.g. boost or hinter everything in adjacent squares).
  • The terrain or some enemy attacks create obstacles within the terrain you need to work around.
  • New skills can be obtained while playing, as well as ways to strengthen those (increase their output, decrease their penalties, increase their duration).
  • As you play more, the difficulty will increase. There is no visual indication of this yet and there is no way to switch saves or abandon the gameplay. For the time being, delete the save file to start anew.
